section.title: Vulnerabilities dashboard
section.p: The dashboard provides a high-level summary view of the vulnerabilities detected on your infrastructure, and consists of a number of dashboard cards to drill down from for detailed information.

By default, the dashboard automatically refreshes every 15 minutes. To change to a manual refresh, click Manage sources > Automatically refresh dashboard. The manual refresh dashboard option appears at the top of the dashboard.

section.title: Highest risk vulnerabilities
section.p: Ranked by risk score, these are the highest risk vulnerabilities affecting your infrastructure.

p.note: The risk score is a normalized score from the one calculated by your vulnerability scanner.

section.title: Most vulnerable nodes
section.p: Ranked by the total number of vulnerabilities, these are the names of the most affected hosts within your infrastructure.

section.title: Most common vulnerabilities
section.p: Ranked by the total number of affected nodes, these are the most common vulnerabilities detected within your infrastructure.

section.title: Top vulnerabilities
section.p: Ranked by risk score, these are the top vulnerabilities detected within your infrastructure.

p.note: The risk score is calculated using the risk score from your vulnerability scanner, and the number of nodes the vulnerability is detected on.
